title: Theranos and its founder charged with ‘massive’ fraud
text:
Theranos and its founder charged with ‘massive’ fraud Wednesday, March 14, 2018 - 01:51 
Theranos and its founder, once a Silicon Valley darling who set out to shake up the blood testing industry with the prick of a finger, agreed to settle ''massive fraud'' charges, according to the Securities and Exchange Commission.   
Theranos and its founder, once a Silicon Valley darling who set out to shake up the blood testing industry with the prick of a finger, agreed to settle "massive fraud" charges, according to the Securities and Exchange Commission.  //reut.rs/2Ip1qjb
